Review Name: Value-for-money Review Description: Satisfied with the product. Flipkart delivered the product timely. Product seems good. Not received any call from Jeeves till 7 April. Then in the evening I got no. of voltas. Very next morning they sent technician to install ac. The best part is they have not charges any thing as inverter ac installation is free of cost in Voltas. After installation Jeeves team contacted us then I said no need to come. I am happy.
